name: Divided by Corruption
description:
Divided By Corruption

This is a dark-themed mini-RPG made for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021 with "STRENGTH LIES IN DIFFERENCES" as the theme. 

You are Zero, survivor of the Grand Corruption, previously featured in "Rise of the Forsaken", who battles through the corrupted lands to find respite in this world.

In order to efficiently defeat your enemies, you must strip away their armour by attacking with different attack types. Otherwise, you will deal pitiful amounts of damage to their armour. The game has three attack types, slash (red), blunt (yellow), and magic (purple). 

Due to overscoping, or corruption by overscoping, the game has some missing features, some known bugs, and requires much polish; however, there are a few rooms and battles to play that showcase the underlying mechanics.

Controls

  • WASD to navigate menus and battle targets
  • Space to advance or make a selection
  • Tab to switch between party members to issue commands
  • Escape | Left Ctrl to cancel a command or target selection

Team

  • Omar Salam (twitter@ramo38p): Game design, programming, music editing, and some art.
  • Forsaken000 (instagram@Forsaken000): Art for Characters, monsters, and some spells (basically the art that actually looks good).
